title: CIRCE
text: CIRCE is an Italian research network with the aim of fostering collaboration and advancing research in Extreme Value Theory (EVT) and its applications. The community brings together italian researchers working on the theory, methodology, and applications of extreme value statistics. It is open to faculty members, postdoctoral researchers, PhD students, and practitioners interested in extremes.

title: Contact
text:
CIRCE is an open and inclusive community. Researchers interested in extreme value statistics and related fields are welcome to join and contribute to the network.
For general inquiries or to join the community, please contact one of the coordinators:

Simone Padoan

Ilaria Prosdocimi

Luca Trapin
